resources.string: The app requires the \"Usage stats\" permission, which you have to explicitly grant in your OS Settings.
Failed to launch any app, are you sure you have used any?

Please grant access to usage stats via adb or root access. You can do this using the following steps (for adb):
1) Download Android Debug Bridge (adb) from https://developer.android.com/tools/releases/platform-tools to your PC
2) Enter your terminal shell
3) Plug your phone into the PC and make sure you've allowed USB debugging
4) Type "adb shell pm grant com.tymwitko.recents android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS"
